General.Name: LSI Software S.A.
General.Description: LSI Software S.A. develops software for enterprise resource planning, retail chains, gastronomy, hotels, and sports and recreation facilities. It offers implementation of professional B2B systems, as well as modern equipment, and consulting and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in Lodz, Poland.

1.Name: Mr. Bartlomiej  Grduszak
1.Title: Financial Director & VP of Management Board
